div.head: To my ever honoured Friend Tho. de Gray upon his select Peece of Horsemanship and Ferriery.
div.l: SAge h'ast Thou made our Later age,
Thou art the Phoenix of our Time;
Certes, Thy rare Peece I presage
Hath wonne the Fleece it's so sublime.
My younger Pen cannot but waite on Thee,
Whose Name shall ever bee most deere to mee.
